projectGridLines.stationName: Rusk Media Pvt. Ltd - Business Analyst, New Delhi
projectGridLines.title: Financial Analyst
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

This role will be anchored around Business KPls management, interfacing with Founders, Team Heads & Finance team. The rote is expected to work as part of Founder's office and serve as central intelligence for leadership team to take data-backed initiatives timely.

Skill sets:

Excel modelling is a must.

Written communication (emails & excel).

Knowledge of Tableau, PowerBl is a bonus plus.

Traits expectation:

Strives for perfection in output.

Attention to detail & love for numbers. Able to develop data-backed point of view.

Expected learning:

The candidate will learn to get first-hand experience on how to scale a business in the 1 to 10 journey. Learning will be steep on getting business insights from data, MIS management and soft-skills essential to corporate.

Specific courses required for project execution:

Intermediate to advanced level Excel is a must
